title: (New Player) My Client Won't Finish Installation
body:
Hello people, I'm new here so I hope that this is the right forum for this inquiry.

I just downloaded the beta client and started up the game installation. At first it said that I needed to download about 6500mb. After about 5% downloaded that number shot up to an estimated 13000mb. After about 40% the download speed decreased to 40kbps, and then zero. After restarting the client, the download begins at 0% and repeats the same series of events.

I tried this several times and got the same result each time. I checked my internet and found no issues there. Still, I can't manage to get through the installation.

I feel that there must be some answer for this that I am overlooking. 

(I'm using a 2012 model MBA 11" running OS 10.9.5 "Mavericks")

replies.body:
Not being able to properly patch certainly isn't a proper welcome to League.  (๑◕︵◕๑)

Based on the description of your issues, I'd wager that your issue is being caused by your patcher disconnecting from our patching servers due to an *unstable connection* to them. An unstable connection to our servers is usually caused by certain network settings that conflict with League. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers those network settings that may be causing this issue.

If you encounter further issues with this, let me know. ^.^
Thank you for the reply, I'll be sure to check out the connection guide. :-)
